name: True Blood's Bon Temps Bloody Mary
description: Sure, perhaps the Bloody Mary is a sigh-inducingly obvious choice for a Halloween event, but when drunk in celebration of True Blood, it takes on a whole new meaning.
recipeIngredient: Pickled green beans or pickled okra, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the tomato juice, vodka, lime juice, and Worcestershire in a cocktail shaker. Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne. Stir. Fill a highball glass with ice and pour the drink over the ice. Garnish with the beans or okra. Serve immediately.
